job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Front-end Developer on the Halo team, you'll help build an easy-to-use interface for our AI platform. Our platform empowers businesses with advanced AI technologies-like agentic AI and a customizable knowledge base. You'll work closely with the rest of the team to turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages. You will, amongst others:
     * Develop & Optimize:
       Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3. Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP.
     * Design & User Experience:
       Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design. Your ideas will help guide the layout and interactions to ensure a smooth experience for all users.
     * AI Integration:
       Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end, making advanced tools easy to use.
     * Innovation & Experimentation:
       Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly. Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
     * Performance & Scalability:
       Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online, so everyone enjoys a smooth experience.

   Join us on the Halo team and use your front-end skills to help shape the future of AI-powered business tools.

You connect with us, if you

   Feel connected to our Shared Values
     * Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
     * Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
     * Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
     * Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.

   You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation., As a Club Member, you'll unlock a world of incredible benefits:
     * Fuel your mind: Daily healthy lunches and snacks to keep you energized.
     * Effortless commutes: Shuttle mobility cards and company cars get you where you need to be.
     * Invest in your future: A solid pension plan.
     * Take your time off: 25 vacation days with the option to buy 10 more to provide peace of mind.
     * Own your success: Become a shareholder with our Employee Share Purchase Program.
     * Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
     * Life's a party: Weekly drinks, board game nights, karaoke throwdowns, yearly ski trip, and more! We have something for everyone.
job_details.full_text:
Developer (Halo)

As a Front-end Developer on the Halo team, you'll help build an easy-to-use interface for our AI platform. Our platform empowers businesses with advanced AI technologies-like agentic AI and a customizable knowledge base. You'll work closely with the rest of the team to turn complex technology into clear, engaging web pages. You will, amongst others:
     * Develop & Optimize:
       Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3. Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP.
     * Design & User Experience:
       Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design. Your ideas will help guide the layout and interactions to ensure a smooth experience for all users.
     * AI Integration:
       Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end, making advanced tools easy to use.
     * Innovation & Experimentation:
       Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly. Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
     * Performance & Scalability:
       Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online, so everyone enjoys a smooth experience.

   Join us on the Halo team and use your front-end skills to help shape the future of AI-powered business tools.

You connect with us, if you

   Feel connected to our Shared Values
     * Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
     * Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
     * Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
     * Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.

   You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development. You thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation., As a Club Member, you'll unlock a world of incredible benefits:
     * Fuel your mind: Daily healthy lunches and snacks to keep you energized.
     * Effortless commutes: Shuttle mobility cards and company cars get you where you need to be.
     * Invest in your future: A solid pension plan.
     * Take your time off: 25 vacation days with the option to buy 10 more to provide peace of mind.
     * Own your success: Become a shareholder with our Employee Share Purchase Program.
     * Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
     * Life's a party: Weekly drinks, board game nights, karaoke throwdowns, yearly ski trip, and more! We have something for everyone.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on building user-facing applications powered by LLMs and NLP, emphasizing AI integration into the front-end. While it involves software development and some understanding of AI technologies, the core is on the application layer rather than deep model development or MLOps.

phrases: Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3
Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services
Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end
Ensure the interface is fast and responsive
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building and maintaining a user interface, integrating it with backend services, and ensuring its performance and scalability, which are all hallmarks of software development.

phrases: AI platform
agentic AI
customizable knowledge base
AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP
bring AI features to the front-end
AI-driven automation
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions working with AI services powered by LLMs and NLP, and integrating AI features, indicating a direct involvement with generative AI models and their application.

phrases: empowers businesses with advanced AI technologies
making advanced tools easy to use
shape the future of AI-powered business tools
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the goal of using AI to provide business value and make complex tools accessible to users, demonstrating an understanding of the business context.

phrases: Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, ensuring performance and responsiveness under load relates to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining a functional application, which has overlap with MLOps principles for user-facing systems.

phrases: Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly
Experiment with different ideas to find what works best
job_tasks.justification: This task directly addresses the need for exploring new technologies and experimenting with different approaches to improve the platform.

phrases: Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
Innovation & Experimentation: Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly. Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
Design & User Experience: Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design.
AI Integration: Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end
Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development.
Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.
